name: Model Inversion
description: Degree to which the model is resistant to model inversion attacks and protects the privacy of training data.

values.name: Provably Resistant
values.description: Model provably resistant to model inversion attacks, with formal guarantees on the privacy of the training data.

values.name: Strong Defenses
values.description: Strong defenses against model inversion, such as differential privacy or data sanitization techniques, significantly increasing the difficulty of reconstructing training data.

values.name: Some Mitigation
values.description: Some measures to mitigate model inversion (e.g., limiting model output precision), but significant risks remain.

values.name: High Risk
values.description: High risk of model inversion attacks, sensitive training data can be easily reconstructed from model outputs or gradients.
